GSD.description:
cifs: fix small mempool leak in SMB2_negotiate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 38a6b469bf22f153282fbe7d702a24e9eb43f50e. For more details please see the references link.
